title: Make moving page responsible in smaller screens
description:
currently, the `/moving` page displays a bar graph where each bar represents one day of strava activity.
when a bar is hovered, a tooltip appears displaying the distance accomplished in each activity done in the
day represented by the bar. although the experience works well on desktop and big screens, it isn't good
on both smaller screens or touch devices (the hover experience simply doesn't work on those).
